messages.message: Acknowledgement message. The message being acknowledged The first checksum The second checksum
Heartbeat message. The severity of the message 1(low)-5(high) The status message
Attitude report (Euler Angles). The roll angle (degrees x 1e2). The pitch angle (degrees x 1e2). The yaw angle (degrees x 1e2).
Location report The latitude (degrees x 1e7) The longitude (degrees x 1e7) The altitude (meters x 1e2) Speed over ground (meters/sec x 1e2) Course over ground (degrees x 1e2) Gps clock(sec)
Optional pressure-based location report Pressure altitude (meters x 1e2) The airspeec (meters/sec x 1e2)
Status text message The severity of the message 1(low)-5(high) The status message

Algorithm performance report Main loop interval (seconds x 1e3) The number of cyles of the main loop The number of times the gyros have saturated The number of times the adc constraints have been applied Renormalization due to sqrt Renormalization due to blowup Number of gps fixes received Imu health status 0(poort)-1(good) Number of gcs messages received

Request the current command UNSPECIFIED

Upload a command to the autopilot 0 (insert in list) 1 (execute now) Item number in list Length of command list this command is being inserted into The command to be sent parameter 1, typically action info (i.e. glide path angle) parameter 2, typically latitude (degrees x 1e7) parameter 3, typically longitude (degrees x 1e7) parameter 4, typically altitude (degrees x 1e2)

Upload a list command to the autopilot, add to list, don't execute immediately Item number in list Length of command list this command is being inserted into The command to be sent parameter 1, typically action info (i.e. glide path angle) parameter 2, typically latitude (degrees x 1e7) parameter 3, typically longitude (degrees x 1e7) parameter 4, typically altitude (degrees x 1e2)
